thread.title: 10 of J端rgen Klopp's Greatest Touchline Celebrations
thread.title_full: 10 of J端rgen Klopp's Greatest Touchline Celebrations | Complex UK

author: Corey Pellatt
title: 10 of J端rgen Klopp's Greatest Touchline Celebrations
text:
J端rgen Klopp is coming to takeover the Premier League.
Before the week is out, we expect to hear that the charismatic German is the new manager of Liverpool following Brendan Rodgers' sacking last week. It's an appointment that's universally loved.
Klopp rose to proimenence after revitalising a down-and-out Borussia Dortmund side to lead them to two German league titles and a Champions League final. The 48-year-old isn't afraid to show his passion on the touchline and after announcing his departure from Dortmund last season, the Bundesliga YouTube channel put together a video package highlighting his greatest moments.
This is what Liverpool fans have got to look forward to. We can't wait for the inevitable Klopp vs. Pardew touchline scrap.
[via YouTube ]
